resources.string: Briefly describe the {{object_name}} in this image. Specifically, provide technical details or information about its construction, but do not guess details which are not apparent in the photo.

This application uses generative AI to describe the content of images, and those responses may be inaccurate or inappropriate. [Learn More](https://www.facebook.com/privacy/guide/genai/). Your queries and the generative AI responses are not retained by Meta.
Look at your left palm to activate camera scanner controls.
Press play to begin the scan, and pause to end scanning.
Select an object to learn more information about it.
Try moving to a different room or location, or select one of the generated objects.
Look for one of the curated objects: a phone, fridge, or television. Or select one of the generated objects.
You can scan your surroundings to identify objects with the play button. Select a detected object to learn more about it, or choose from generated objects.

## More Room. More Organization. More Fun!

 - Stay Connected: Share photos, stream music or video, read recipes, and more all from your fridge's AI companion.
 - Chill Out: Cool your summertime drink with fresh cubed or crushed ice with the Dual Auto Ice Maker.
 - Better Workflow: A flat-front fridge design with a recessed drawer handle blends into any kitchen beautifully.

## Unmatched Quality, Endless Watchability.

 - Stunning Views: With 4k resolution, enhanced picture quality and 100% color volume, you've never seen your content like this before.
 - Smartly Secure: Connect your accounts worry-free with a top-of-the-line security system, keeping your data locked tight and your viewing hassle-free.
 - All Content, All the Time: Connect your streaming apps, or search our library of 5000+ free titles. Never miss a title again!

## Experience More. Do More. Effortlessly.

 - Never Stop Playing: With up to 36 hours of video playback, you're good to go all day on a single charge.
 - Capture the Moment: With an unmatched 2-in-1 camera system, you'll get the shot you want no matter the lighting.
 - Powerfully Professional: 6-core GPU, 6 core CPU, and a neural engine mean you've never been faster at getting things done.
